is_vec3: In some cases you want to check and see what data type a variable holds in GameMaker Studio 2 and that's when you would use this function. It returns <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt> depending on whether the value is a 3 value vector or not.
The above code checks the variable "val" to see if it contains a vec3 and if it is not then it shows a message in the debug console.
